attributes.action: Home Britain's homeless in hotels until they can be homed permanently.
attributes.additional_details: It's only fair and just I pay my taxes for all people.
attributes.background: All UK residents that are homeless have the right to a hotel room till the local council home the individual on a permanent basis just as we do for illegal immergrants.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:
'Ensure everyone experiencing homelessness can access emergency accommodation'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647221
